**The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern**

**Scripture Title:** *The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern*. Compiled by Daoist Adept Zhao and others during the Song-Yuan period, transcribed and prefaced by Gong De. A collated and annotated edition of *The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Great Cavern*. Two fascicles. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, *Dongzhen* section, *Benwen* category.

---

**The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern**

Hold the tablet centered before the heart, gaze forward, and knock the teeth. Visualize the chamber filled with purple clouds of *qi*, enveloping the body like a crown. Golden Lads and Jade Maidens attend beside the scripture, while the Three Radiances and precious mushrooms illuminate the room. Knock the teeth and softly invoke:

"The heavens are bright, the *qi* is clear,
The Three Radiances illumine the cavern’s light.
Golden chambers and jade halls,
Five mushrooms bloom with treasured might.
Mysterious *qi* and purple canopy,
Descend to grace this form of mine.
Immortal lads and jade maidens,
Bestow your numinous power divine.
The Nine Thearchs align in splendor,
The Three Origins share their car.
Ascend beneath the purple canopy,
To enter the Thearch’s court afar."

**Mystic Concealment Spell for Opening the Scripture**

Pierce the gate of subtle mystery,
Resplendent, vast as empty sky.
The supreme Dao arises in stillness,
Where the Three Primes’ palace comes nigh.
The Great Way is perfected here,
Riding cloud-dragons through the air.
Immortals attend left and right,
Jade maidens and lads so fair.
This body attains the deathless law,
Untangles knots in the spirit’s breeze.
Seven ancestors return to womb,
Their lineage reborn as immortals’ seeds.

Knock the teeth, close the eyes, and bow in prayer, saying:

"Humblest servant [Name], a fleeting mortal of this dust,
Now offers these modest words,
To supplicate the Jade Clarity’s Primordial Lady of the Rosy Origin,
The Lofty Sage, Myriad Perfected, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Dao,
The Central Yellow Elder, Primordial Simplicity Dao Lord,
The Supreme Clarity’s Marshal of All Immortals, Master of Longevity, Lord of the Three Heavens, Perfected of Cypress Completion,
The Scripture-Teacher of *The Scripture of the Great Cavern*, Holy Mother, Primordial Lady of the Purple Tenuity, Lady Wang,
The Great Unifier of the Returning Wind, Holy Mother, Primordial Lady of the Central Marquis, Lady Wang,
The Supreme Clarity’s Ninefold Subtlety, Jade Protector, King of the Golden Watchtower, Grand Minister of Fate, High Dawn Master, Lord Azure Florescence of the Eastern Sea,
The Supreme Clarity’s Great Void, Lord of the Eastern Glow, Fusang Vermilion Forest, Supreme Dao Lord,
The Patriarchal Perfected of the Southern Culmen, Supreme Clarity’s Dao Master, Holy Consort of the Jade Dawn, Golden Watchtower’s Protector, Lord of the Eastern Florescence,
The Golden Watchtower’s Grand Master, Supreme Clarity’s Immortal Marquis—

This servant now enters the chamber to recite *The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Great Cavern*,
Praying that the dawn’s radiance may shine forth,
Illuminating this servant’s viscera and palaces with flourishing splendor,
Dispelling calamities and misfortunes,
Returning the seven ancestors to the womb,
That together we may ride the cloud chariot."

Close the eyes and visualize the Lord of the First Thearch,
Like an infant, four inches tall,
Dwelling within the philtrum beneath the nose,
Governing the assembly of the hundred spirits,
Seated amidst five-colored clouds.
Visualize the Lord of the First Thearch in the empty mystery,
His mouth directly aligned with this servant’s mouth,
Listening to the recitation of the Jade Scripture.

---

**Talismanic Script of the Great Cavern’s Thunderous Numen**

Inscribe the talisman on yellow silk,
With cinnabar for the inner text,
And black ink for the border.
Wear it when walking,
Use it as a mat when seated or bowing,
To subdue the myriad demons
And stabilize the spirit’s resolve.

**Talismanic Script of the Great Cavern’s Illuminating Ward**

Carve the talisman on precious materials,
Inscribing both sides,
Encase it in brocade,
With an outer pouch of yellow silk.
Wear it when conducting affairs,
So that the Demon Kings of the Six Heavens
And the Wardens of the Three Heavens’ Prohibitions
Dare not obstruct or impede.

---

**Inner Secrets for Reciting the Scripture**

Sit upon the Thunderous Numen Talisman,
Wearing the Illuminating Ward Talisman.
Still the mind and visualize the body within the Northern Dipper of the Three Heavens.
Upon completion, knock the teeth thirty-nine times,
Then recite the Concealed Writ
And enter the root scripture.

---

**The Divine Wisdom’s Concealed Writ of the Great Cavern**

Mysterious radiance scatters the celestial shores,
The clear Han brushes past the returning clouds.
Wondrous *qi* illumines the Three Dawns,
Cinnabar auroras reflect the Purple Tenuity.
The myriad heavens inscribe numinous hues,
Streaming through the skies in profuse array.
The spirit lamp shines bright as the Long Star,
The Net of Separation exhales its luminous ray.
Four peaks gird the lofty clouds,
Mysterious essence shades the eight directions.
The Three Primes open the high void,
Orchid towers unfold their layered gates.
Golden ramparts mirror the Jade Clarity,
Numinous splendor marks the celestial precincts.
Winds arise in the Eightfold Assembly Palace,
Fierce beasts gallop through the clouds.
In the bustling Three Cavern Courts,
Perfected Ones intermingle in disarray.
Above dwell the thousand radiant spirits,
Their hidden virtue towering and sublime.
The Great One gathers the threads of fate,
Grasping life’s reins, wielding the spirit’s banner.
The Orthodox Unity treads the flourishing numen,
Summoning the myriad spirits to return.
The Duke’s son flanks the silent axle,
The Cavern Yang guards the mystery’s pivot.
At the dawn’s clarity, the Dao is harmonized.
The dragon chariot pauses in its circuit.
The Seven Radiances align with the Spirit Kings,
Whirlwind wheels traverse the ten-thousand treetops.
The body soars above the mysterious ford,
Flying steps ascend the ridge’s ladder.
Parting the radiance, enter the spirit’s mound,
Resplendent, the feathered robes tremble.
Hidden depths intermingle in clouded assemblies,
Flying radiance bears the spirit’s communion.
Green peaks without a speck of haze,
Silken unions arise in the void’s expanse.
Golden splendor girds the numinous carriage,
Winged immortals soar in majesty.
Ten-thousand reins scatter through the void,
Lush and misty, the mystery’s upper window.
Within arises the Lord of Harmonized Radiance,
The Nine Thearchs flourish the Supreme August.
The luminous wheel shines upon the Yellow Tranquility,
Feathered pearls gleam in the Mysterious Yang.
The celestial essence of primordial simplicity,
The Central Five named Nurturing Light.
Bound clarity gives birth to the nascent spirit,
Nine Perfected unite as a pair.
Wondrous radiance reveals the hidden reckoning,
Following resonance, it marks the spirit’s trace.
The Muddy Pellet’s cavernous primordial light,
Directs the pearl to the Crimson Palace.
The Gate of Life in the Primordial Yang’s domain,
Three spirits escort the Purple Lad.
Restrain and summon them to return above,
Flanking the portals, attending the bright window.
Canopies face the Brilliant Star,
Circular splendor illumines the Three Thoroughfares.
Square fullness draws forth and connects life,
Reversing age to return to infancy.
Whirlwinds gleam across the Nine Heavens,
Green axles coil around the cinnabar chamber.
Whispering winds weave beyond the mist,
Curved crimson rests in the flowery hall.
Roaming the hidden, gazing upon ten-thousand transformations,
Returning to assemble with the Spirit Sovereign of the Cloudy Empyrean.
The immortal’s path delights in life’s flourishing,
The ghostly path delights in misfortune’s thrall.
One hears only of the precious path of life,
Never of the ghostly path’s rise.
Jade songs harmonize with the celestial *qi*,
The *Primordial Rectitude of Precious Life*’s foremost chapter.
Divine wisdom commands the vermilion troops,
The Five Thearchs’ talismans chill the northern wilds.
Brandishing banners to capture the myriad demons,
Jade writs restrain the Feng’s dark domain.
The body’s dissolution is the Dao’s natural course,
The vanquishing of demons is not your merit.
Floating radiance beats the long fan,
Numinous beings rejoice on the cloudy peak.
Gazing below at the four flying perils,
Heaven’s kalpas never end.

Within the wondrous arises the true vision,
The returning chariot moves as if lingering slow.
The mind aligns, preserving the unseen resonance,
Carrying forth the sublime and lofty marvel.
Soaring wings await the wondrous convergence,
What peer could match this penetrating gaze?
With a whistle, a shout, a sigh in an instant,
Swiftly traversing the nine enclosures.

Gathering *qi* to revert to the primal exchange,
Merging radiance to dwell in the profound and mysterious.
The Three Primes—these are the Three Prime Lords.
Wu You Shou—the name of the Great One.
Lü Chang Ling—the style of the Jade Emperor Lord.
Gongzi—this is Wu Ying Gongzi.
Dongyang Jun—the name of the Right White Prime Spirit.
Li Ming Chu—the name of the Central Controller of Destiny.
Hai Dao Kang—the name of Tao Tao Kang.
He Jing Jun—the name of the Eight Perfected within the gallbladder.
Nine Emperors Chang Shang Huang—the name of the Nine Perfected in the Muddy Pellet.
Ming Lun—the name of the Four Perfected within the liver.
Huang Ning—the name of the Three Perfected of essence and blood.
Yu Zhu—the name of the Two Perfected in the stomach duct.
Xuan Yang—the name of the Seven Perfected in the left kidney.
Tian Jing—the name of the One Perfected within the heart.
Yuan Su—the name of Wu Ying Gongzi.
Yang Guang Zi—the name of the spleen spirit.
Dong Yuan Jun—the name of the Muddy Pellet Lord.
Yun Zhu—the name of the Cinnabar Prime Lord within the heart.
Yuan Yang Chang Ming Men—the name of the Primal King of the Lower Origin.
Zi Tong—the name of the Minor Lad of the Grand Tenuity.
Ju Zhi—the name of the Nine Prime True Youth.
Shang Gui—the name of the Hun Maiden of the August One.
Yi Wei—the name of the Purple Prime Left Prime Lord.
Qi Ming—the name of the White Prime Right Prime Lord.
Yuan Hua—the name of the Moon Spirit.
Fang Ying—the name of the Peach Lord within the moon.
Jie Sheng—the name of the Controller of Destiny within the sun.
Shen Hui—the name of the heart spirit.
Wu Di—the name of the kidney spirits.

The Great Tenuity Jade Talisman of the Grand Tenuity
The incantation for wearing the talisman reads:
Minor Lad of the Grand Tenuity, named Gan Jing Jing, styled Hui Yuan Zi, also called Three Collars Intertwined, also called Peer of the Imperial Perfected.
Ever guards beneath the root of the tongue, the mansion of blood and fluids.
The Grand Tenuity is the body of initial cultivation.
The Minor Lad is the Lad.
Peer of the Imperial Perfected signifies the meaning of mutual companionship in knowledge.

The Jade Pure True King’s Incantation reads:
Celestial Treasure, Great Concealment gives birth,
Illuminating Beam, the primordial *qi* above,
Seals for me the lower gate,
Beyond the secure pass of life’s reception.
Yi Yuan Yu Tong Jun,
Arrayed in the Verdant Chamber Pavilion,
Seven Ancestors untie their knots,
Following the wind to leave the root’s source,
Matching Heaven’s foundation for ascension,
Penetrating the transformations of the Eight Mysteries.
Great Concealment gives birth—this is the human heart.
Illuminating Beam—this is the human breath.
Yi Yuan Yu Tong—the spirit of the nose.
Verdant Chamber—this is the philtrum.

Another incantation reads:
Primal *qi* arises from its origin,
Five Paths bear the numinous forth,
Feminine and masculine lodge in divine transformation,
Vast and profound, the darkly luxuriant,
Jade tones resonate with the Grand Harmony,
Myriad chants issue from the Primal Center,
The immortal court revolves through nine cycles,
Hundredfold chaos unites in the One,
Change holds the Void Within,
All enter the Imperial Assembly Chamber.
Feminine and masculine—these are the Lords of the Feminine One and Masculine One of the Great Tenuity.
Change Holds—this is the name of the northwest gate of the Nine Heavens.
Imperial Assembly—this is the name of the hall chamber.

Visualization Chart
Upper Scroll of the Jade Canon of the Great Tenuity

Highest Scripture of the Void Sovereign Lord, First Scroll

The Supreme Cavern Mystery,
Primal birth of the Nine Heavens.
*Qi*-Ancestor of the Great Void,
Lineage-Wind bears forth the Mystery.

The Mystery’s kin dispersed and severed,
Four Purities govern in tranquility.
Imperial Unity’s Upper Radiance,
Links the multitudes and gathers the mists.

Eternal Pact of the One Revolution,
Seven generations cast into repose.
Entrusting the numinous, binding fate,
Returning to the blossom of spontaneity.

Vast and distant, flowing into the Void,
Six Luminaries drift in ascent.
Ascending Brahma, bearing splendor,
Western Florescence manifests peace.

Immortal registers, imperial tablets—
All attain liberation at the source.
Womb-Field’s profound path,
Generations issue jade orchids.

Numinous light of the Eight Luminaries,
Gives rise to the myriad spirits.

[Three Indigo Nets, Waves Reach the Terrace.]

The *qi* of the Highest Jade Sovereign,
Within the human body is the *qi* of the Bright Beam,
Descending to correspond with the human nose.
For when humans receive the embryo and form the body,
The nose is first to take shape—
The meaning of "Nose-Ancestor" is drawn from this.

Lineage-Wind is another name for Ancestral *Qi*,
Generation upon generation, transformation upon transformation,
Mystery upon mystery—
The meaning of "Mystery’s Descendant" is drawn from this.

"Kin dispersed and severed" refers to the human body,
The ancestral kin’s cast-off traces, hidden and manifest,
Within which lies the mechanism of natural resonance,
Where dispersion and convergence attain great liberation.

"Imperial Unity’s Upper Radiance" is the True Unity,
The unparalleled Dharma-gate, the supreme vehicle’s wondrous Dao.

"Links the multitudes and gathers the mists" means
To connect and thread the multitudes of *qi*,
Gathering the numinous mists—
Drawing from the lungs as the flowery canopy of the five viscera,
The Bright Beam’s ancestral *qi* is tied to the nose.

"Six Luminaries" refers to the Six Luminaries of the Southern Dipper,
*Qi* floats in the southern blaze,
Signifying the omen of transformed form and altered countenance.

"Ascending Brahma" is the name of the Jade Sovereign Lord, Feng Ascending Brahma.
"Manifests peace" is the name of the White Emperor of the Lungs, Zhang Anxing,
Styled Western Florescence.

"Womb-Field" refers to the immortal embryo congealed in the Cinnabar Field.
"Eight Luminaries" are the Eight Radiant Scenes.

Great Cavern Supreme Unity Jade Talisman

Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

The Supreme Unity Venerable Deity is named Wu You Shou, styled Gui Hui Chang, also called Jie Meng, also called Ji Pin. He constantly rests beneath my Jade Pillow, at the posterior gate of the Mud-Pellet Palace. The occipital bone behind the brain and the space between the brows, three inches inward, form the Cinnabar Field—this is the Mud-Pellet Palace. The posterior gate of the Mud-Pellet Palace lies precisely beneath the Jade Pillow, where the Governing Vessel enters.

*Scripture of the Jade Sovereign of the Highest August, Second Chapter*

The Jade Sovereign follows the Mysterious Return,
Wandering the Celestial Dawn of the Golden Empyrean.
Resplendent shines the imperial radiance,
Swiftly born upon the Feast of Jade Isle.
To the left, he summons the Divine Youth of Beginnings;
To the right, he commands the Ever-Assisting One to rise.
The Illuminated Perfected gleams across the Nine Empyreans,
Three days’ [mystery] unfolds the Dark Expansion.
A thousand scenes merge with the Three Girdles,
Within lies the Profound and Boundless Void.
Now I attain longevity,
A thousand kalpas mark but one cycle.
The Yellow Register guards the Power of Virtue’s measure,
Donning brocade, he enters the Divine Mound.
The Supreme Unity’s root of life’s mandate,
The Noble Scion commands the numinous banner.
Ten revolutions fulfill the initial resolve,
Attaining entry into the Root of Great Faith.
Depart the hall, unite—
Push the turning wheel, revolve.

The Heaven of the Jade Sovereign is the Qian Yang. "Follows" means that humans, receiving the uprightness of the One *Qi*, thus follow life—unlike grasses and trees, which grow in reverse, or birds and beasts, which grow horizontally. The Mysterious Return Master is the name of the Supreme Unity’s essence-spirit, also the numinous root of the Mud-Pellet Palace. "Celestial Dawn" is the name of the Feminine One Sovereign. "Golden Empyrean" is the name of the Masculine One Sovereign. "Wandering" means to roam freely. "Resplendent" refers to the brilliance of the sun and moon. "Imperial radiance" is the scene where the Feminine One dwells. "Swiftly born" is the name of the wind. "Jade Isle" is the scene where the Masculine One dwells. The Divine Youth of Beginnings is the name of the Primordial Sovereign of the Yellow Court. The Ever-Assisting One is the name of the Mud-Pellet Palace’s Imperial Minister. "Illuminated Perfected" is the name of the Nine Heavens Terrace. "A thousand scenes merge with the Three Girdles" refers to the Lesser Lad of the Great Tenuity, also called the Essence of a Thousand Scenes, also called the Intertwining of Three Girdles. "Profound and Boundless Void" is the style of the August Supreme Unity Sovereign. "Virtue’s measure" is the name of the Nine Heavens Terrace. "Divine Mound" is the numinous cavern of the Supreme Unity. "Noble Scion" is the Peerless Noble Scion.

*Great Cavern Supreme Jade Talisman of the August Highest*
Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

The August Highest Jade Sovereign Lord is named Feng Ling Fan, styled Lü Chang Ling, also called Bi Ling, also called Divine Venerable. He constantly guards the space between my brows, beyond the Purple Gate. One inch inward from the space between the brows is the Hall of Light; one inch to the left is the Azure Chamber; one inch to the right is the Purple Gate.

*Scripture of the August Highest Jade Sovereign Lord, Third Chapter*

The Sovereign bears the Dark Loft Banner,
Commanding the nine celestial stairways.
The Seven Awakenings ride the wondrous Dao,
Joyously the divine wind returns.
The radiant gale halts at the Northern Bloom,
The Purple Flower sings at the Eastern Bend.
Jade harmony resounds beyond the Nine Empyreans,
The subtle jade tally of the Great Tenuity.
The Three Simplicities generate the Mud-Pellet Palace,
Emitting the golden numinous radiance.
The Venerable Lord firmly upholds the summit,
Guarding the death-defying mechanism.
The Ten Virtues arise within the Mysterious,
Transcending death to rejoice in brilliance.
Pearl-luster entwined, vast capital numinous.

The Dark Loft Banner, also called the Reverse Flower Banner, is the Jade Sovereign’s decree for summoning the Perfected and governing the numinous. "Northern Bloom" refers to the Northern Retained Spring Immortal Garden, called the Halting Bloom. "Eastern Bend" is the Eastern Ultimate Azure Florescence Heaven. The Nine Empyreans are the Divine Empyrean, Jade Empyrean, Grand Empyrean, Azure Empyrean, Green Empyrean, Crimson Empyrean, Scenic Empyrean, Supreme Empyrean, and Jade Empyrean. The Three Simplicities are the Three Simplicity Venerable Lords. "Golden numinous radiance" is the divine light of the Golden Elixir. "Firmly upholds the summit" is the name of the Three Simplicity Venerable Lords. "Death-defying mechanism" is the Death Gate. The Seven Awakenings correspond to the number of fire.

*Great Cavern Talisman of the Peerless Master*
Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

The Left Peerless Master, styled Master Profound-None, courtesy name Master Conjoined-Tally, also called Lord Primordial Essence or Divine Master. He constantly guards beneath my left armpit: the posterior portal of the liver. On the back, three inches left of the spine, opposite the left breast, beneath the scapula of the left arm.

*Scripture of the Purple Empyrean of the Supreme August Master*, Chapter Four:
The Grand Obscurity severs the Nine Profounds,
The Cavern’s radiance lodges numinous communion.
The Jade Emperor rides the Crimson Empyrean,
Verdant auroras illumine the Golden Ramparts.
The upper palace lies within the Cloud Pearl,
Gazing upward to the boundless peak.
The numinous pass beneath the Great Desert,
Mist and foam mirror the void.
Obscure light blends with the Child of Chaos,
The Fire King is Master Profound-Above.
Marvelous quiescence shares life with the Lofty,
The Boundless guards the Valley Lad.
The round path knows no stagnation,
Wondrous union enfolds nine layers.
Southward, it severs the roots of the seven ancestors,
Westward, it dissolves the misfortunes of successive generations.
The body leaps beyond the myriad ford-waves,
The spirit engenders and gathers the ten directions.
Fire returns to the reversed womb-chariot,
The Three Conjoined ride the celestial dragon.
Unfathomable nurturance scatters omen and birth.

"Lodges" means without attachment to form. "Crimson Empyrean" refers to the Crimson Mound Heaven. "Golden Ramparts" is the name of a palace in the Nine Heavens. "Cloud Pearl" is the name of a celestial court, meaning the Golden Ramparts Palace lies within the Cloud Pearl Court. "Great Desert" denotes the earthly portal. "Mist" signifies lightning-dew; "foam" signifies bubble-shadows, implying that gazing down upon the worldly dust is like mist and foam. "Obscure light" is the name of the Seven Perfected of the left kidney. "Child of Chaos" is the name of the Lord of Crimson Qi within the blood. "Master Profound-Above" refers to the name of the Peerless Master. "Marvelous quiescence" is the inner name of the Heart Lord. "Lofty" is the name of the Supreme Primordial Father Lord. "Boundless" is the name of the Lord of Yellow Qi within the womb. "Valley Lad" is the name of the essence-spirit of the Central Origin Lord of the Cauldrons. "Wondrous union" is the name of a terrace in the Nine Heavens. "South" points to the Upper Palace of Southern Prosperity; "roots" denote the root of the womb-tree. "West" points to the capital of the Queen Mother of the West; "generations" denote the branches of the profound lineage. "Myriad ford-waves" lie beneath the Wondrous Union Terrace. "Fire returns" refers to the spirit of the Flowing Gold Fire Bell, causing fire to ascend to the upper fruit. "Reversed womb-chariot" is the vehicle for returning and delivering womb immortals at the juncture where paths are severed and roads cut off.

*Great Cavern Talisman of the White Prime*
Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

The White Prime Venerable Deity on the right is named Wondrous Standard of the Luminous Yang Palace, styled Profound Yi of the Absolute, also called Vermilion Essence, also called Inaugurator of Completion. He constantly guards beneath my right armpit, behind the lung’s rear gate. On the back, three inches to the right of the spinal bone, opposite the right breast, and beneath the scapula of the right arm.

*Scripture of the Dao of the Celestial Emperor of Grand Tenuity, Fifth Chapter*
The Celestial Emperor of Grand Tenuity—
Eight Floatings ascend to the Cloud Camp.
Divine Ancestry governs the spirit’s lapel,
Dragon Mountain adorns Jade Capital.
Golden Chambers luxuriate in bright auroras,
Nine Portals gleam with lofty jasper.
Yellow Court traverses Northern Origin,
Primal Father turns left to illumine.
Vermilion Essence, Inaugurator of the Luminous Master,
In profound solitude ascends Supreme Clarity.
Four Profounds uphold the Primal Prohibition,
Ever guarding the Five Thearchs’ City.
Transcending stagnation in Heaven,
Traversing the inception of the Dark Obscurity.

Eight Floatings is the name of a wind. Divine Ancestry is the name of the Central Controller of Destiny. Dragon Mountain is the name of the Central Terrace in the Jade Clarity Heaven. Bright Aurora is the name of a Nine Heavens Palace. Lofty Jasper is the name of a Nine Heavens Chamber, referring to the nine orifices’ gates that communicate with the luminous Lofty Jasper Chamber. Northern Origin is the secluded portal of the Yellow Court. Left-Turning Illumination is the style of the Supreme Primal Father Lord. Vermilion Essence is the name of the White Prime Venerable Deity. Inaugurator of the Luminous is the name of the White Primordial Right Origin Lady. Profound Solitude is the style of the Grand One Lord. Four Profounds denote the Four Symbols, the Four Sages, and the spirits of the four limbs. Five Thearchs’ City refers to the five viscera.

*Great Cavern Controller of Destiny Jade Talisman*
Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

Central Controller of Destiny Venerable Lord,
whose name is Li Mingchu,
whose style is Xuandu Qing,
also called Divine Ancestor,
also called Numinous Radiance.
He constantly guards within my Crimson Palace’s heart chamber,
the gates of its four apertures.
The heart has seven orifices,
whose spirits are named:
Pi, called Dharma Enclosure;
Zhu Xiao;
Cinnabar Sovereign;
Moving Pearl;
Divine Wisdom;
Cavern Source;
and Cavern Clarity.

*Third Scripture of the Three Primes’ Purple Essence*
Within the Purple Essence of the Great Prime,
the Three Primes’ Upper Radiance Way:
Resplendent and bright, the Treasure of the Great Chaos,
dim and distant, it unfurls the Thearch’s seat.
Elder Scribe initiates the Three Simplicities,
the Thearch’s spirit ascends to Jade Clarity.
Auspicious qi nurtures the five clouds,
the Controller of Destiny, Divine Bright Beginning.
Ten Radiant Perfected Immortals of Wondrous Conduct,
commanding demon-quelling Feathered Bright Chariots.
The blossoming courtyard—
its gaze and plans now fulfilled.

Upper Radiance refers to the Solar Office.
Resplendent Brightness is the name of a Nine Heavens Terrace.
Thearch’s Seat refers to the Thearch’s throne.
Elder Scribe is the name of the Primordial Sovereign of the Yellow Court.
Three Simplicities refers to the Three Simplicity Venerable Lords.
Thearch’s Spirit is the name of the Thearch-One.
Divine Bright Beginning is the name of the Central Controller of Destiny Lord.
Ten Radiant refers to the Ten Poles Heaven.
Feathered Bright is the name of a chariot.

*Great Cavern Peach Well-Being Jade Talisman*
Recitation of the Secret Incantation:

**Peach Well-Being Lord of the Gate of Destiny**, named Child Dao-Kang, styled Harmonizing Essence-Extension, also called Gate of Destiny, also called Root of the Womb. Ever guards the pass within my navel, beyond the Gate of Destiny. Located three inches below the navel, its form is one inch square and round. In men, it stores essence; in women, it stores the fetus—this is the Lower Cinnabar Field.

*True Yang Primordial Elder Mysterious Unity Lord’s Scripture, Chapter Seven*
True Yang Thearch-Treasure Elder,
receives affairs in audience with the Jade Thearch.
Extinguishes demons, purges filth-water,
a hundred offices journey to the Crimson Palace.
Within the Leisure Abode of Cinnabar Mystery,
the five qi congeal the ten directions.
Seven revolutions summon the Controller of Destiny,
three returns call the Immortal Elders.
The Mount Tai Lord of Ghosts
hastens to examine the Three Offices.
Ten virtues form the initial foundation,
together ascending, the Seven Awakenings fill.

"Grasping dark sand, count the Fortune Spirits."

True Yang refers to the name of a hall in the Upper Clarity Heaven.
Thearch-Guest is the name of Left Immortal Zhongchengzi.
Filth-water refers to the water of corpse-filth.
Crimson Palace means the heart.
Leisure Abode is the Bright Hall of true qi.
Cinnabar Mystery is the Palace of Mud-Pill.
Seven revolutions refer to the thought-moment—once a thought stirs, the seven apertures all open, meaning that by raising a thought, the Controller of Destiny arrives.
Lord of Ghosts is the mountain spirit.

*Great Cavern Heaven-Gate Jade Talisman*

The Secluded and Vast One is the style of the Grand One Lord. Brahma Prosperity is the name of the Grand One’s essence-spirit. Yellow Tranquility is the name of the Three Perfected of Essence-Blood. Jade Spirit is the Jade Youth of Supreme Clarity. Thearch’s River, a pool. Jade Palace, Supreme Clarity itself.

*The Three Divine Jade Talismans of the Great Cavern*
Recite the talisman’s subtle invocation:
The Upper Prime Minister of Mud-Pill Palace,
Named Zhao Lejing, styled Zhong Xuansheng,
Also called Qi Feibo, also Chang Fu Zhao.
The Middle Prime Minister of Crimson Palace,
Named Zhong Guangjian, styled Si Hualing,
Also called You Chebo, also Dong Shihua.
The Lower Prime Minister of Yellow Court,
Named Gui Shangming, styled Gu Xiaxuan,
Also called Feng Shenbo, also Cheng Guangsheng.
Ever guard my Three Prime Palaces,
Protect my original destiny,
Safeguard my Thearch’s chamber.

*The Scripture of the Great Void’s Dawn Lord, Engraved in the Jade Gate Cavern Palace of Mount Emei, Chapter Thirty-Eight*

The Three Perfected birth the Great Void,
Jade Gate □ dawn’s auroras.
The Great Simplicity’s Cavern Spirit,
Cinnabar Forest bears vermilion branches.
Returning spirit to the Ninefold Palace,
Inner Prosperity blooms jade blossoms.
A hundred passages receive essence-fluid,
Prolonging years in Three Elegance’s vale.
The nascent body ascends Jade Clarity,
Seven ancestors escape the dark paths.
Ever preserve beyond the final kalpa,
For myriad ages inheriting the immortal lineage.
Enthroned as the Sage Lineage’s Venerable,
The Great Cavern’s capital of Jade Clarity.
Lingchang Jade, the Lord of a Hundred Paths.

The Great Simplicity’s Cavern Spirit refers to the Great Simplicity Heaven’s Cavern-Radiant Palace of Primordial Spirit. Inner Prosperity is the name of a terrace. Three Elegance, a mountain. Great Cavern Capital, the divine capital.

*The Great Cavern Thearch-One Jade Talisman*
Recite the talisman’s subtle invocation:
The Venerable Lord of the Great Cavern Thearch-One,
Named Fu Ningzai, styled He Mujing,
Revolving winds blend and merge,
Guarding the tight passes of death’s qi,
Commanding the thirty-nine gate spirits of the body.
Ever present within the human—
Within the upper lip, the inner side of the upper teeth,
And below the nose in the philtrum, where the spirit dwells,
The convergence of all spirits’ affairs.
For the Conception and Governor Vessels are the seas of the body’s yin and yang,
The meeting of the five qi’s true origin.
The immortal scriptures say:
"A single thing embraces five hues,
Forever the immortal’s ladder."

*The Scripture of the Western Prime’s Nine-Spirit True Immortal Mother, Azure Gold Elixir Sovereign Lord, Chapter Thirty-Nine*

Western Prime’s ninefold spirit,
Golden Elixir flows in Cloud Palace.
Ascending to the utmost apex of radiance,
Splendor and light fill the great auroral sky.
In motion, revolving the Nine Heavens’ wheels,
In stillness, sinking the Eight Streams’ net.
Within the chamber, the Embryo Immortal Mother,
Bearing the lapels of the Grand Thearch.
Mysterious Unity’s spirit arises in time,
The Three Elders spread the plain and firm.
Left hand grasps the Five Talisman Registers,
Right hand carries the governance of the divine lineage.
Together ascending the Vermilion Dragon Gate,
Bowing heads in the Jade Clarity Chamber.
Uprooting the roots of death and decay,
Nurturing form within the Three and Five.
Seven ancestors untie the corpse’s knots,
Receiving blessings in the Bright Vermilion Realm.
Supreme Clarity’s Sacred Central Venerable,
Talisman-transforming Mysterious Qi King.
Utmost qi’s longevity,
Receiving the luminous chariot.

The Western Origin refers to Mount Tongbo or, as some say, Mount Kunlun. The Nine Spirits is the name of a hall within the mountain. The Nine Heavens’ Wheels are the celestial gates. The Eight Streams’ Net refers to the eight mountains of the earthly axis. The Immortal Mother is the Mother of Earth, known as the Yellow Matriarch, the Lady of No Night, the Great Medicine King—she embodies the Dao of refining form within the Great Yin.

The Spirit of the Time is the name of the Central Mysterious Unity Elder. The Three Elders are the Three Pristine Lords. The Divine Lineage refers to the Central Controller of Destiny, the Venerable One. The roots of death and decay signify the uprooting of the thirty-nine death gates. The Three and Five denote the vertical and horizontal numbers of the River Chart.

The *Great Cavern’s Jade Talisman of Total Perfection*
This talisman encompasses the thirty-nine talismanic true qi at the abode of the Supreme Unity. Alongside the thirty-nine talismans, all are inscribed in cinnabar, written on yellow paper, and worn with a plain blue silk sash measuring five feet and five inches. Even when used alone, this talisman may achieve great perfection.

The Incantation of the Supreme Mystery Perfected One
The Perfected One, surnamed Zhao and named Shouzhen, presides over the Palace of Supreme Mystery and Clarity.
Heaven within heaven, the celestial peak and sacred summit,
Pavilions and terraces, palaces and halls, chambers and courts,
Cavernous abodes and jade chambers, halls of fortune and golden cities,
Spiritual chariots and imperial seats, the names of the highest ranks—
All passages and orifices open and flow,
Doors and windows, lattice and frames,
Sun, moon, and stars leap forth, light fills the eyes,
Wind, clouds, mist, and auroras, qi congeals in harmony,
Rivers, pools, and ocean waves, blood and fluids, essence and spirit,
The five viscera and six bowels, the face and form of the body,
The womb’s knots and nodes—each harbors its own spirit.
Seek them and they are unseen, call them and they respond at once.
Though spirits number in the millions, they serve the One of Pure Tranquility.
One source, myriad streams—though turbid or clear,
All rivers return to a single source, the four seas merge as one.
Vast is the Cavern of Emptiness, the Six Harmonies’ Yellow Court,
The True One is undivided, the Dharma gate has no lock.
The thirty death gates, their deathly qi ever frozen—
I call to my spirits, ever keeping them wakeful,
As if from sleep they awaken, as if from drunkenness they sober.
Empty and numinous, the Valley Spirit unites the Five Phases,
Ninety-seven forms radiate great light.
The qi of the death gates naturally regenerates,
Ancestral qi returns to moisten, descendant branches flourish.
Litigation ceases, grievances dissolve without trace,
All beings are universally delivered, wondrous practice reaches completion.
The wealth of the Great Cavern overflows with myriad treasures,
Its nobility ascends to the highest immortal ranks.
The chariot returns to complete the Dao,
Ascending to the Supreme Mystery and Upper Clarity.

The *Jade Stanzas of the Great Cavern’s Inner Jade Chapters*
The Great Dao Lord of the Azure Youth,
Treading the clouds of Fusang in the east,
Transmits the Great Cavern’s decree,
Luminous stanzas and resplendent talismanic script.
Resonant jade tones, pure echoes reach the imperial gates.
Moved by compassion for the world of mortals,
He vanquishes demons and dispels malevolent vapors.
Bestowing upon me the light of purity,
Its vast salvation illumines without bound,
Like the ancient Cang Jie, he ferries those within the Mystery.
The Five Palaces bloom with radiant hues,
The Nine Origins ever guard the body.
Tiger robes subdue all evil,
Dragon banners summon the hundred spirits.
The Net of Separation exhales white qi,
Revealing the dawn of the highest realms.
The Supreme Unity blends yin and yang,
The Seven Perfected divide them.
Briefly visiting the Six Abyssal Palaces,
Then returning to the Ninefold Wheel of Light,
Eternally enduring beyond all kalpas,
Forever neighbor to the Great Beginning.

The Purple Void Lady, named Yuanjun,
Rides a simurgh to pay homage at the Mysterious Capital.
In hand she holds the *Great Cavern Scripture*,
Its jade pendants chiming with a crystalline ring.
Dividing the stanzas into thirty-nine,
She exhales qi to inscribe the numinous talismans.
Summoning and gathering the spirits of the living body,
She guards their abodes in stillness and secrecy.
The Nine Perfected stand in solemn vigil,
The Three Origins protect the storehouses.
To her left, she carries the Thousand Radiance Essence,
To her right, she embraces the Ever-Upholding One.
Together they enter the Yellow Chamber in joy,
Their mirrored hearts retaining the cloud-like pearl.
Roaming the True Yang Lodge,
Her ancient chariot drawn by feathered luminaries,
Green peaks pierce the empyrean,
Dark radiance grazes the celestial thoroughfare.
The profound root of the Cavern’s subtlety,
The vast and boundless arising from the Great Nonbeing—
Who could have foreseen that in a mere instant,
She would surge forth with the fury of wind and thunder?
Forever preserved as an immortal elder,
Myriad spirits attend her call.

On the Three Mao Brothers of Mount Juqu,
Ranked among the immortals’ assembly,
They welcome the Lady Wei Yuanjun,
Her golden tablets inscribed with jade patterns.
Resplendent in crimson auroras,
Adorned with towering Jade Dawn crowns,
Within purple chambers and brocade canopies,
Their courtyards lined with azure jade.
With one heart they approach the Orchid Gate,
Step by step ascending the Heavenly Altar.
Carefree, they tread the Milky Way,
Whistling and roaming, their pendants chiming.
The Three Dawns scatter spiritual radiance,
The Four Seas calm their waves.
Swiftly they ride divine tigers,
Brushing their robes as they mount azure simurghs.
Ascending to the honored ranks of the sagely lineage,
Dissolving the hardships of accumulated kalpas.
Inhaling the qi of the Nine Spirits,
Refining the Sevenfold Return Elixir.
Nurturing form within the imperial chamber,
Revolving the wind to open the celestial gates.
The Dao flows through natural essence,
Numinous power descends to the mortal realm.

The *Jade Stanzas of the Great Cavern’s Inner Jade Chapters of the Jade Clarity*
*Upper Grade of the Jade Stanza of the Jade Clarity Lord*
The Azure Plum Lord of the Azure Youth,
Driving dragons to court the Purple Palace.
The Nine Luminaries illuminate the Eight Poles,
The Five Celestial Granaries descend to the Gate of Life.
The Twenty-Eight Constellation Lords,
Resplendent, brighten the celestial gates.
The Five Emperors arrive in jade chariots,
The Three Officials bestow profound grace.
Auspicious light pervades heaven and earth,
Propitious qi revives the spring of yang.
Heavenly officers fix the immortal registers,
The Ding and Jia spirits dispel demonic vapors.
Golden veils unveil the jade stanzas,
Sun and moon halt their crimson wheels.
Myriad spirits fill my chamber,
My longevity endures with heaven and earth.

*Middle Grade of the Inner Jade Stanza of Jade Clarity*
The Supreme Great Luo Heaven,
Three Radiances merge with the Four Illuminations.
Purple portals birth Brahma qi,
Golden light blazes through the Nine Clarities.
All spirits unite in harmony,
The Great Sage awaits the Jade Capital.
Cavern stanzas chant jade tones,
The Central Yellow unfolds the precious scripture.
The Five Emperors proclaim jade talismans,
The Three Officials summon the hundred spirits.
Kalpa after kalpa, they respond to great peace,
Returning to the root like an infant.
The true wind ever billows,
The Dao’s qi perpetually pure.
Jade maidens scatter gem-like blossoms,
Golden lads leisurely tend the jade gates.
The Non-Action Red Origin Lord,
Accompanies the Dao in its rising and sinking.

*Lower Grade of the Inner Jade Stanza of Jade Clarity*
Towering, the Ninefold Mountain of Light,
Its jade towers housing the highest immortals.
Sun and moon circulate golden qi,
Dragon and tiger rush through the Mysterious Pass.

Irrigating the chambers of azure mushrooms,
Divine sprouts rise in emerald mist.
Resplendent, the purple auroras glow,
Myriad sages descend in cloud-borne chariots.
Cavern hymns ring clear and bright,
Piercing through heaven upon heaven.
Should one preserve this chamber,
For ten thousand kalpas they become a celestial immortal.
The inner treasure is not sought without—
This is the supreme mystery.
Refining the great vessel of treasure,
One dissolves and drifts back to the imperial chariot.

**Talisman of the Capital Artisan**
*Incantation for Ingesting the Talisman:*
The sun rises, vast and radiant,
True Martial roams and traverses.
Marching with talisman, commanding water,
Seated, surveying the four directions.
Seek the Dao and attain the Dao,
Seek immortality and attain immortality.
Long life and enduring vision,
Rank receives true auspices.
At the sight of myriad evils,
Their hearts tremble in dread.
Hasten, hasten, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

*Usage:* Ingest with reverent invocation. For ablutions, this talisman is also used.

Also named *The Great Cavern Jade Clarity Register of the True Talisman of the Capital*, this is the first talisman in the Jade Script Talisman Treasury of the Lord Lao, the foremost of the three numinous writings.

*The Perfected of the Great Mystery’s Incantation:*
Thirty-nine portals,
Firmly guarded by spirits.
Before hearing the Jade Scripture,
None knew their names.
Thirty-nine talismans,
Circulate with the qi’s movement.
Without seeing the Jade Scripture,
Their patterns remain obscure.
I possess the affinity of the Dao,
My heart revolves the Jade Scripture.
The scripture commands reverence,
The scripture commands sincerity.
Talismans seek unity with qi,
Spirits respond in unison.
The numinous valley, cavernous and void,
Myriad sounds resonate of themselves.
The azure sky bears no clouds,
Yet the true script emerges on its own.
The principle of resonance,
Gathers spirit and concentrates essence.
The fetal knot unravels of itself,
The corpse’s blood clarifies on its own.
Yang returns to the ancestral root,
The mysterious blossom flourishes evergreen.
Father’s serenity, mother’s essence,
Revolving wind, congealing staff.
The precious pearl radiates light,
Returning to the womb, the infant coalesces.
Qi revolves the vast potter’s wheel,
Fire and timing harmonized.
Embrace the feminine, hold the masculine,
Withdraw vision, return hearing.
Nurture the infant child,
Wealth and honor fill the Yellow Court.
Ascent and descent occur naturally,
The mirror turns toward Jade Clarity.
Once the fetal carriage returns,
The jade mat ascends on high.
After ten thousand recitations, the Dao is complete,
Dragon and crane come to welcome.
Merit accomplished, fame achieved,
The mystery and the common alike shine in glory.

*Here ends the Lower Scroll of the Great Cavern Jade Scripture.*

chunks.original_text: 大洞玉经 经名：大洞玉经。 宋元间道士赵真人等撰，龚德同抄录并序。 系《上清大洞真经三十九章》 之校释本。 二卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部本文类。 大洞玉经 秉简当心，临目叩齿，存室内紫云之炁徧满，来冠兆身，金童玉女侍经左右，三光宝芝洞焕室内，叩齿微祝曰： 天朗气清，三光洞明，金房玉室，五芝宝生，玄炁紫盖，来映我身， 仙童玉女，为我致灵，九帝齐景，三元同軿，上乘紫盖，升入帝庭。 开经玄蕴咒 彻微玄景门，焕朗彻空同。 至道由静默，当见三素宫。 大道於此成，骖景策云龙。 左右侍经真，玉女及玉童，身济不死律，解罗顺灵风。 七祖反胎生，世为神仙宗。 叩齿冥目，俯心祝曰： 粪土小兆男臣某，今有微言，上启玉清琼元君、高圣万真太上道君、中央黄老元素道君，上清总仙大司马长生法师主三天君栢成上真、降授《大洞真经》经师上真圣母紫微元君王夫人、降授回风大混合师上真圣母中侯元君王夫人、上清九微太真玉保王金阙上相大司命高晨师东海王青华小童君、上清太无东霞扶桑丹林大帝上道君、祖师南极紫真上清道主玉晨圣后金阙上保东华道君、金阙大夫上清仙侯，臣今入室诵咏《上清大洞真经三十九章》，愿晨晖焕发，＠照臣身脏府荣华，灾祸消散，七祖返胎，同驾云舆。 闭目存帝一尊君，如婴儿，长四寸，居鼻下人中皮内，主集百神、坐五色云中。 存帝一尊君空玄中，其口正对兆口，听诵玉经。 大洞震灵符文 符文用黄素为地，以朱书内，黑书郭。 行则佩，坐迹拜就以为褥，制伏万魔，全神定志。 大洞照辟符文 符用贵重之物，两面刻文，囊用锦，外用黄罗为之。 遇行事佩之，六天魔王三天禁君，不敢砠遏也。 诵经内诀 身坐震灵符，带照辟符，静思身在三台北斗中。 毕，叩齿三十九通，然后诵隐书，入本经。 大洞神慧隐书 玄景散天湄，清汉薄云回。 妙炁焕三晨，丹霞映紫微。 诸天书灵彩，流霄何霏霏。 神灯朗长庚，离罗吐明晖。 四岭带高云，玄精荫八垂。 三素启高虚，兰阙披重扉。 金墉映玉清，灵秀表天畿。 风生八会宫，猛兽骋云驰。 纷纷三洞府，真人互参差。 上有千景精，冥德高巍巍。 太一务猷收，执命握神麾。 正一履昌灵，摄召万神归。 公子翼寂辕，洞阳卫玄机。 明初合道康。 龙舆正徘徊。 七景协神王，飙轮万杪阶。 体娇玄津上，飞步绝岭梯。 披景入神丘，璀璨振羽衣。 冥摅交云会，飞景承神通。 青峰无毫荟，绮合生绝空。 金华带灵轩，翼翼高仙翁。 万辔乘虚散，蓊蔼玄上窗。 中生合景君，九帝昌上皇。 明轮＠黄宁，羽珠耀玄阳。 天精元素炁，中五号养光。 结朗始生神，九真合成双。 妙景启冥数，顺感标神踪。 泥丸洞元光，运珠正绛官。 元阳部命门，三神携紫童。 拘制招上归，夹阙侍明窗。 翳蔚对启明，圆华焕三冲。 方盈引接生，反老回婴蒙。 飙粲丽九天，绿辕绕丹房。 萧萧缠霭表，曲绛寝华堂。 游冥盻万变，归会神霄王。 仙道乐子生，鬼道乐子凶。 但闻贵生道，不闻鬼道隆。 瑶歌参天炁，贵生元正章。 神慧命朱兵，五帝符寒乡。 仗旛摄万魔，琼文检北酆。 体解自然道，妖灭非尔功。 泛景鼓长扇，含灵庆霄峰。 俯盻四谢飞，天劫永难终。

**The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern**

**Scripture Title:** *The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern*. Compiled by Daoist Adept Zhao and others during the Song-Yuan period, transcribed and prefaced by Gong De. A collated and annotated edition of *The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Great Cavern*. Two fascicles. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, *Dongzhen* section, *Benwen* category.

---

**The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern**

Hold the tablet centered before the heart, gaze forward, and knock the teeth. Visualize the chamber filled with purple clouds of *qi*, enveloping the body like a crown. Golden Lads and Jade Maidens attend beside the scripture, while the Three Radiances and precious mushrooms illuminate the room. Knock the teeth and softly invoke:

"The heavens are bright, the *qi* is clear,
The Three Radiances illumine the cavern’s light.
Golden chambers and jade halls,
Five mushrooms bloom with treasured might.
Mysterious *qi* and purple canopy,
Descend to grace this form of mine.
Immortal lads and jade maidens,
Bestow your numinous power divine.
The Nine Thearchs align in splendor,
The Three Origins share their car.
Ascend beneath the purple canopy,
To enter the Thearch’s court afar."

**Mystic Concealment Spell for Opening the Scripture**

Pierce the gate of subtle mystery,
Resplendent, vast as empty sky.
The supreme Dao arises in stillness,
Where the Three Primes’ palace comes nigh.
The Great Way is perfected here,
Riding cloud-dragons through the air.
Immortals attend left and right,
Jade maidens and lads so fair.
This body attains the deathless law,
Untangles knots in the spirit’s breeze.
Seven ancestors return to womb,
Their lineage reborn as immortals’ seeds.

Knock the teeth, close the eyes, and bow in prayer, saying:

"Humblest servant [Name], a fleeting mortal of this dust,
Now offers these modest words,
To supplicate the Jade Clarity’s Primordial Lady of the Rosy Origin,
The Lofty Sage, Myriad Perfected, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Dao,
The Central Yellow Elder, Primordial Simplicity Dao Lord,
The Supreme Clarity’s Marshal of All Immortals, Master of Longevity, Lord of the Three Heavens, Perfected of Cypress Completion,
The Scripture-Teacher of *The Scripture of the Great Cavern*, Holy Mother, Primordial Lady of the Purple Tenuity, Lady Wang,
The Great Unifier of the Returning Wind, Holy Mother, Primordial Lady of the Central Marquis, Lady Wang,
The Supreme Clarity’s Ninefold Subtlety, Jade Protector, King of the Golden Watchtower, Grand Minister of Fate, High Dawn Master, Lord Azure Florescence of the Eastern Sea,
The Supreme Clarity’s Great Void, Lord of the Eastern Glow, Fusang Vermilion Forest, Supreme Dao Lord,
The Patriarchal Perfected of the Southern Culmen, Supreme Clarity’s Dao Master, Holy Consort of the Jade Dawn, Golden Watchtower’s Protector, Lord of the Eastern Florescence,
The Golden Watchtower’s Grand Master, Supreme Clarity’s Immortal Marquis—

This servant now enters the chamber to recite *The Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Great Cavern*,
Praying that the dawn’s radiance may shine forth,
Illuminating this servant’s viscera and palaces with flourishing splendor,
Dispelling calamities and misfortunes,
Returning the seven ancestors to the womb,
That together we may ride the cloud chariot."

Close the eyes and visualize the Lord of the First Thearch,
Like an infant, four inches tall,
Dwelling within the philtrum beneath the nose,
Governing the assembly of the hundred spirits,
Seated amidst five-colored clouds.
Visualize the Lord of the First Thearch in the empty mystery,
His mouth directly aligned with this servant’s mouth,
Listening to the recitation of the Jade Scripture.

---

**Talismanic Script of the Great Cavern’s Thunderous Numen**

Inscribe the talisman on yellow silk,
With cinnabar for the inner text,
And black ink for the border.
Wear it when walking,
Use it as a mat when seated or bowing,
To subdue the myriad demons
And stabilize the spirit’s resolve.

**Talismanic Script of the Great Cavern’s Illuminating Ward**

Carve the talisman on precious materials,
Inscribing both sides,
Encase it in brocade,
With an outer pouch of yellow silk.
Wear it when conducting affairs,
So that the Demon Kings of the Six Heavens
And the Wardens of the Three Heavens’ Prohibitions
Dare not obstruct or impede.

---

**Inner Secrets for Reciting the Scripture**

Sit upon the Thunderous Numen Talisman,
Wearing the Illuminating Ward Talisman.
Still the mind and visualize the body within the Northern Dipper of the Three Heavens.
Upon completion, knock the teeth thirty-nine times,
Then recite the Concealed Writ
And enter the root scripture.

---

**The Divine Wisdom’s Concealed Writ of the Great Cavern**

Mysterious radiance scatters the celestial shores,
The clear Han brushes past the returning clouds.
Wondrous *qi* illumines the Three Dawns,
Cinnabar auroras reflect the Purple Tenuity.
The myriad heavens inscribe numinous hues,
Streaming through the skies in profuse array.
The spirit lamp shines bright as the Long Star,
The Net of Separation exhales its luminous ray.
Four peaks gird the lofty clouds,
Mysterious essence shades the eight directions.
The Three Primes open the high void,
Orchid towers unfold their layered gates.
Golden ramparts mirror the Jade Clarity,
Numinous splendor marks the celestial precincts.
Winds arise in the Eightfold Assembly Palace,
Fierce beasts gallop through the clouds.
In the bustling Three Cavern Courts,
Perfected Ones intermingle in disarray.
Above dwell the thousand radiant spirits,
Their hidden virtue towering and sublime.
The Great One gathers the threads of fate,
Grasping life’s reins, wielding the spirit’s banner.
The Orthodox Unity treads the flourishing numen,
Summoning the myriad spirits to return.
The Duke’s son flanks the silent axle,
The Cavern Yang guards the mystery’s pivot.
At the dawn’s clarity, the Dao is harmonized.
The dragon chariot pauses in its circuit.
The Seven Radiances align with the Spirit Kings,
Whirlwind wheels traverse the ten-thousand treetops.
The body soars above the mysterious ford,
Flying steps ascend the ridge’s ladder.
Parting the radiance, enter the spirit’s mound,
Resplendent, the feathered robes tremble.
Hidden depths intermingle in clouded assemblies,
Flying radiance bears the spirit’s communion.
Green peaks without a speck of haze,
Silken unions arise in the void’s expanse.
Golden splendor girds the numinous carriage,
Winged immortals soar in majesty.
Ten-thousand reins scatter through the void,

chunks.original_text: 命门桃康君，名孩道康，字合精延，一名命门，一名胞根。 常镇我脐中之关，命门之外。 在脐下三寸，其形方圆一寸，男藏精，女藏胎，下丹田也。 真阳元老玄一君道经第七 真阳帝宝老，受事会玉皇。 灭魔除秽水，百司诣绛宫。 逸宅丹玄内，五炁结十方。 七转司命至，三回召仙翁。 太山主鬼者，急校三官中。 十德初成基，同飞七觉充。 玄握沙，称福神。 真阳者，上清天中馆名也。 帝宾，左仙仲成子名也。 秽水者。 尸秽之水也。 绛官谓心也。 逸宅者，真炁之明堂也。 丹玄，即泥丸之宫。 七转者，念头也，一念才动，七窍俱通，谓举念而司命至也。 主鬼者，岳神也。 大洞天户玉符 服符微祝曰 泥丸上一天帝君，名赤子玄凝天，字三元光，一名伯无上，一名伯史原。 常镇泥丸之中，九孔之户。 即上丹田，内有九宫，四雌五雄，各方一寸，其形内圆虚中，红而莹，乃神之所居。 其后户有两脉，贯於脊骨之端。 上元太素三元君道经第八 太素三华炁，晨灯广灵堂，玉宾表玄籍，守命孩道康。 回风散万魔，金符召广乡。 辅卫地户内，保此长生王。 转入十仙门，八景齐洞阳。 明柱子，会合存。 三华者，三华聚顶也。 神灯者，灵光也。 玉宾者，三元君所居馆名也。 孩道康，命门桃康君名也。 召广乡，召登广漠之乡也。 地户者，阴魔之门。 辅卫，即封形闭债，背土凌空之事。 洞阳者，白元尊神名也。 大洞丹皇玉符 服符微祝曰 绛宫中一丹元君，名皇神运珠，字子南丹，一名生上伯，一名史云拘。 常镇我顶中央，大椎骨首户之下。 人脊骨有二十四椎，上第一椎是也。 上清紫精三素君道经第九 紫精毓华林，长明太无外。 玉房生宝云，九扇胞胎内。 帝宾奉五符，三元回紫盖。 仓玉斌来生，卫此长夜会。 五灵度符籍，九统合九元。 三玄出太清，紫阳发万玄。 玄精育九灵，元父结胎仙。 乐伯勒，飞明贤。 紫精者，天中之树，叶似竹而赤，花似镜而明，实似李而无核，食其叶则辟饥，花则不死，实则飞仙，名毓华之林。 九扇者，九重之门，乃帝一胎尊所居之处。 帝宾者，左仙仲成子之名也。 三元者，上元泥九、中元绛官、下元命门也。 紫盖者，黄庭门名。 仓玉斌来生者，节中黑炁君，名斌来生，字仓玉也。 长夜者，节中黑炁所会之名也。 五灵者，五老君也。 三玄者，道之三真也。 紫阳者，官名。 玄精者，胆中八真名。 九灵者，天之九魂也。 大洞黄庭玉符 服符微祝曰 命门下一黄庭元王，名始明精，字元阳昌，一名始童神，一名藏明初，一名婴儿胎，一名史伯原。 常镇我两完间，车轴之下户。 脊骨下第二十四椎是也，与尾闾并两腿、臂骨相连缀耳，运动载身，若车之有轴也。 腰胯当中是也。 青灵安阳元君道经第十 青灵扇八炁，鼓轮三华城。 披此胞胎结，七祖受福生。 宿对灭五道，长守帝一营。 望昌谒，顺万烟。 披者，脱体之义。 五道，即五苦。 灭之者，生神章云：五难缘理去，是也。 大洞九真玉符 服符微祝曰 泥丸九真，名帝真上皇，字帝先灵，一名元宗。 常镇我口之四际。 想自顶上是也。 口神，一名清净和。 皇清洞真大道君道经第十 公子执五符，太一居紫房。

The Highest Supreme feasts in Purple Empyrean,

chunks.original_text: 左肾间七真，名玄阳君，字冥光，一名元生，一名玄冥，一名五帝。 常镇我背骨尽际，地户之下。 皇上四老道中君道经第十三 皇上超无景，输转九曜生。 徊风混帝心，八炁运常宁。 广霞参神天，五帝散日精。 液溢玄中漠，血凝五华平。 体宝圆珠□，流曜莹兆形。 号为寿逸阜，亦曰澄溱渟。 俱济三恶关，启籍登太冥。 令我保仙真，七世披绿青。 解祸冥途中，超福晨上灵。 度世登玉卿，累祖返胎婴。 洞观无碍空，始通生圆明。 骊珠贯方瞳，内外洞照清。 三乐深，五达门。 九曜者，日名，又云眼为日轮也。 广霞者，玉清山名。 五华者，五脏也。 寿逸阜，九天山名，号延寿之国。 三恶关，鬼关也。 绿青者，服青华之炁。 登玉卿，位登玉府上卿也。 圆明者，日月也。 三乐深五达门者，九天祝言，皇上君内名也。 或释之曰：法轮回道上生。 大洞右七真玉符 服符微祝曰 右肾间七真，名玄阴君，字太真，一名上生。 常镇我背下骨，玉关之户。 玉晨太上大道君道经第十四 玉晨九天司，太上大道君。 常保景化内，九回镜上清。 解带玉＠室，乘素入四明。 携提日中王，并羽玉晨灵。 太一召天魔，帝君致万精。 拔过死积炁，越度仙皇庭。 帝立三关上，八风舞神兵。 左挹福醴液，右提庆元軿。 洞微无障玄，梵通明灵生。 贯颡闻十方，豁落一切声。 泓郁遐，渡法令。 景化者，三景道化也。 九回者，金丹九转也。 镜上清者，以大微小童，驾羽明之车，上朝元始，如求镜裹之形也。 四明者，玉帝南门之名也。 左挹右提者，谓左耳斟右肾之水，右耳酌左肾之水。 梵通明灵者，妙通大梵，聪明达灵也。 贯颡闻十方者，灵音贯颡，流响云营也。 大洞六真玉符 服符微祝曰 肺中六真，名上元素玉君，字梁南中童。 常镇我颈外，十二间梁之中。 十二间梁，肺筒两边也。 盖颈两条，各有六条大筋。 存法，一神守二梁也。 太清大道君道经第十五 太清浮绝空，三天宝神符。 日中开五晖，青帝圆常无。 捧籍登太明，受箓金华楼。 五脏植玉根，魂魄一凝和。 洞空清净玄，炁通生清明。 定和妙明觉，玄息自长生。 明考梨，拔劫阿。 浮绝空，太清山名，应鼻为中岳。 太明者，日宫名也。 金华楼，太清楼名。 玉根，鼻神名也。 玄息者，象龟引炁，以耳不以鼻，是为玄息。 大洞五真玉符 服符祝曰

Between the left kidney dwell the Seven Perfected, named Dark Yang Lord, styled Mystic Radiance, also called Primal Birth, Dark Mystery, and the Five Thearchs. They ever guard the farthest reaches of my spine, beneath the Earth Gate.

*August Sovereign’s Four Elders Dao-Middle Lord’s Scripture, Chapter Thirteen*
August Sovereign transcends the formless,
revolving the Nine Luminaries into life.
Whirling winds blend the Thearch’s heart,
Eight Qi circulate in constant peace.
Vast rosy clouds intermingle with divine heavens,
Five Thearchs scatter the sun’s essence.
Fluids overflow the Dark Void’s desert,
blood congeals, the Five Flowers level.
The body’s treasure is a perfect pearl,
flowing radiance gleams, revealing its form.
Named Longevity’s Abundant Leisure,
also called Clarity’s Deep Pool.
Together they cross the Three Evil Passes,
open the register to ascend Great Darkness.
Let me preserve the immortal perfected,
seven generations don robes of green and azure.
Untie calamities on the dark road,
surpass blessings to rise with dawn’s spirits.
Cross the world to ascend Jade Ministers,
ancestors return to the womb’s infancy.
Peer through the unobstructed emptiness,
first penetrate the living’s perfect clarity.
Black pearls string through square pupils,
within and without, all is luminously clear.

Three Joys profound, Five Gates open.

The Nine Luminaries are the sun’s name, or the eyes called solar wheels. Vast rosy clouds are the name of Jade Clarity Mountain. The Five Flowers are the five viscera. Longevity’s Abundant Leisure is a mountain of the Nine Heavens, the land called Extended Life. The Three Evil Passes are the demonic gates. Green and azure refer to absorbing the qi of Azure Flower. Ascending Jade Ministers means attaining the rank of Upper Minister in the Jade Bureau. Perfect clarity refers to the sun and moon. Three Joys profound, Five Gates open is the inner name of the August Sovereign in the Nine Heavens’ invocation. Some interpret it as the Dharma Wheel revolving on the path of rebirth.

Between the right kidney dwell the Seven Perfected, named Dark Yin Lord, styled Supreme Perfected, also called Upper Birth. They ever guard my lower spine, the gate of Jade Pass.

*Jade Dawn Supreme Great Dao Lord’s Scripture, Chapter Fourteen*
Jade Dawn governs the Nine Heavens,
Supreme Great Dao Lord.
Ever preserving the radiant transformations within,
Nine Revolutions mirror Upper Clarity.
Loosening the sash in the Jade Seal Chamber,
riding plainness to enter the Four Clarities.
Carrying the sun’s central king,
feathered immortals join Jade Dawn’s spirits.
Great One summons celestial demons,
Thearch Lords gather the myriad spirits.
Pull free the accumulated qi of death,
leap beyond to the immortal thearchs’ court.
Thearchs stand above the Three Passes,
Eight Winds dance with divine soldiers.
Left ladle the nectar of fortune,
right grasp the chariot of primal blessings.
Penetrate the subtle without obstruction,
Brahma’s path connects luminous life.
Piercing the forehead, hear the ten directions,
vast and open, all sounds.
Profoundly serene, crossing the Dharma’s decree.

Radiant transformations refer to the Dao’s transformations of the Three Radiance. Nine Revolutions are the nine cycles of the golden elixir. Mirroring Upper Clarity means that with the Lesser Lad of Great Tenuity driving the feathered luminous chariot to pay court to the Origin Prime, it is like seeking one’s form within a mirror. The Four Clarities are the name of the Jade Thearch’s southern gate. Left ladle and right grasp refer to the left ear drawing water from the right kidney and the right ear drawing water from the left kidney. Brahma’s path connects luminous life means wondrously penetrating Great Brahma, attaining keen hearing and luminous spirit. Piercing the forehead to hear the ten directions means the spirit’s sound pierces the forehead, its resonance flowing through the cloud camps.

*Great Cavern Six Perfected Jade Talisman*

Within the lungs dwell the Six Perfected, named Upper Prime Pure Jade Lord, styled Liang Southern Lad. They ever guard the outside of my neck, within the Twelve Interval Beams. The Twelve Interval Beams are the two sides of the lung’s cylinder. The neck has two columns, each with six great sinews. In the visualization method, one spirit guards two beams.

*Supreme Clarity Great Dao Lord’s Scripture, Chapter Fifteen*
Supreme Clarity floats in the absolute void,
Three Heavens’ treasure divine talismans.
Within the sun, the Five Splendors open,
Azure Thearch circles in constant nothingness.
Holding the register, ascend Great Clarity,
receive the writ in the Golden Flower Tower.
Five viscera plant the Jade Root,
soul and spirit unite in harmonious congealment.
Penetrate emptiness, pure and tranquil,
qi connects, life’s clarity arises.
Stable harmony, wondrous luminous awakening,
mysterious breathing naturally grants long life.
Illumine the pear, uproot the kalpa’s net.

Floating absolute void is the name of Supreme Clarity Mountain, corresponding to the nose as the Central Marchmount. Great Clarity is the name of the solar palace. The Primordial Effulgence King of the Great Ultimate,
Three Heavens’ divine immortals converge.
Purple Simplicity veils towering heights,

Uprooted from the Five Realms of Suffering,

Lingering beneath Flourishing Florescence,
reverent they summon the Five Spirits.
The adept’s body ascends the Jade Hall,
the Five Gods revert to infancy.
Together they cross beyond the Great Vast,
nurturing purity to attend Round Clarity.
Penetrating emptiness, pure and harmonious,
Florescence pervades, guiding the Mysterious Dark.
Refining the Five Sprouts’ savor with the tongue,
embracing goodness, exhaling longevity.
Revolve Round Clarity, the spirit’s primal net.

Purple Simplicity veiling towering heights refers to the name of the Left Primordial Lord. Florescence Capital is the abode where the Primordial Lord resides. In the Sovereign Primordial Purple Prime’s midst,

The Three Heavens gleam with ninefold effulgences,
Separating and uniting the myriad lives of billions.
Clad in crimson kerchief and verdant auroras,

Transcending the body to pass beyond the Primal Azure.
White Simplicity ascends the towering peaks,
Golden gates ward the crimson hosts.
The seven ancestors’ accumulated corpse-knots,
In one transformation scatter and dissolve.
Receiving blessings in the Eastern Auroral Chamber,
Returning to the womb in the Vermilion Fire Court.
The Cavern Spirit’s pure disputation is wondrous,
Power flows through from the self’s serene luminance.
The Pure Perfected’s hands grasp the Dipper,
Feet tread upon the Nine Prime Stars.
Brandishing control of Heaven and Earth’s gates,

chunks.original_text: 左目童子名灵飞，字阳光，常镇我左目之瞳。 四斗中真七晨散华君道经第二十八 斗中四真人，散华玉清台。 帝卿中玄生，一回众真来。 香风扇三宝，五脏映清夷。 苍胡颉光华，檀炽钧吉祥。 太中六炁清，曲水天河襄。 大度功圆成，五魔伐六阴。 中结元始王，高观六合庭。 鲜曲玄，镜重车。 四真人，四斗之神也。 中玄生，泥丸帝卿名也。 三宝，山名。 清夷，宫名。 襄者，升也。 泉曲之水，下注北酆，升为天河，上贯南斗，了明此道，沈者皆升。 五帝大魔伐六阴，而阳回六府。 大洞阴精玉符 祝曰 右目童子，名晨婴，字阴精。 常镇我右目之瞳。 辰中黄景元君道经第二十九 辰中黄景炁，三秀登霄庭。 沧台飞羽轮，迎延道已成。 司命奉帝书，号为玄度卿。 保生太霞宫，列宾馆上清。 命门合精延，守我身黄宁。 左携元素君，右摄朱蔚灵。 太和度七觉，点火生真文。 紫华顶胎仙，元命真中神。 总命本，登龙津。 三秀，山名。 沧溟，台名。 迎延，符名。 玄度卿，司命丈人名也。 合精延，桃康君名也。 黄宁子玄，精血三真名也。 元素君， 无英公子名也。 朱蔚灵，右白元尊神名。 七觉者，火之成数也。 又离为火，而文明发混洞赤文之秘也。 华顶胎仙者，三华聚顶，胎结成仙也。 真中神，乃真中之阳神也。 大洞胎仙玉符 祝曰 肺部童子，名素明，字虚成。 常镇我肺部之下。 金阙后圣太平李真天帝上景君道经第三十 金阙上景炁，十方晖紫烟。 三命太一尊，五召太平神。 七转招岳真，玉符告三官。 拔籍三灵下，受生高上晨。 太灵八灵王，一化回庆云。 桃君守六合，勒精卫泥丸。 太清八景观，十德真文宣。 保子神中神，元命生自然。 晖延勒，得日贤。 金阙者，肺也。 太一胎尊，随所应现，太平后圣，自然通神。 岳真者，五岳众真也。 颁玉符而告三官大帝，技死籍於三灵之神乡，则受生於高上之晨官矣。 八灵君，太帝精魂之字。 六合，明堂名。 勒精、泥丸，帝卿名。 八景，八神名。 大洞胎神玉符 服符微祝曰 胎中一元白炁君，名务玄子，字育上生。 太一精魂，名玄归子，字盛昌，号八灵王。 二神常镇我五脏之上，结喉之本户。 结喉，一名金楼，一名重楼，一名三思台，神有十二，亭长真人在其内，主通上下炁也。 太虚后圣元景彭室真君道经第三十一 太虚空无景，霞中有彭室。 九云合重扉，帝君静幽密。 八真合景君，上携女太一。 雌雄混玉房，九变还返七。 分形散六合，泥丸易分别。 太真九光轮，十住 音曳文结。 保子元炁通，五炁理中颉。 混一归帝阙，永寿无穷劫。 变化飞上清，三千行超越。 乘元轮，入幽宗。 空无景，山名。 彭室者，彭君之室，室中主延生之符。 重扉者，门也。 合景君，胆中八真名。 十住，乃十地，一属阳，略伸笔过右，便是阴，此耦之所由生也。 此言 文者，正得反阴为阳之义。 理中颉者，中理五炁，混合百神，颉乃升上之义。 大洞结中玉符 祝曰 结中青炁君，名按延昌，字合和婴。 元君精魂，名保谷童子，字明光。 二神常镇我五脏之下，胃之上口。 正指胃口，存其神在胃口内也。 前言胃管二真者，存其神在胃口外也。 太玄都九炁丈人主仙君道经第三十二 太上九炁上，烟回太晖间。 神光秀空峰，五道焕三天。

chunks.original_text: 五脏惟心肺居膈上。 中央黄帝，名含光露，字魂明。 常镇脾胃之中。 《黄庭经》曰：脾长一尺掩太仓。 又《中黄经》曰：胃为太仓。 太仓之口，胃脘之内，正是分擘清浊，传递之户也。 玄洲二十九真伯上帝司禁君道经第三十七 玄洲绝三津，羽景太无庭。 回霄飞重漠，委化混万精。 五云蔚绝空，七霞落圆明。 朗朗幽寥子，梵昌济黄宁。 五老飞绛华，散香携玉灵。 金质濯帝川，绿 烟霭流琼。 神拔三涂积，仙胎结兆形。 上清玉皇师，玉宸大道君。 与心绛宫神，飞澄太玄尊。 开神华，大纪元。 玄洲绝岛之下，有三弱之津，即弱水也。 羽景，堂名。 重漠，山名。 圆明，日名也。 幽寥子，太一君字也。 梵昌，太一精魂名也。 黄宁，精血三真名也。 玉灵，上清之玉童也。 帝川，池名。 玉宸，即上清也。 大洞三神玉符 服符微祝曰 泥丸上元帝卿，名兆勒精，字中玄生，一名起非伯，一名常扶肇。 绛宫中元辅卿，名中光坚，字四化灵，一名幽车伯，一名董史华。 黄庭下元弼卿，名归上明，字谷下玄，一名奉申伯，一名承光生。 常镇我三元之宫，卫我本命，守我帝室。 太无晨中君刊峨眉山中洞宫玉户太素君道经第三十八 三真生太无，玉户□晨霞。 太素洞元灵，丹林生朱柯。 回神九重府，内昌发琼华。 百关纳精液，停年三秀阿。 兆身腾玉清，七祖离幽涂。 长保不终劫，万世承仙家。 位为圣统尊，玉清大洞都。 陵昌玉，百涂君。 太素洞元灵者，太素之天，洞焕元灵之殿也。 内昌，台名。 三秀，山名。 大洞都，神都也。 大洞帝一玉符 服符微祝曰 大洞帝一尊君，名父宁在，字合母精，回风混合，镇卫死炁紧关，统三十九户之神，常在人中或上唇之内，光□目中瞳子，自无而有之，自有而无之，有有不有，无无不无，号真一之所，变万归一之道。 上唇之内，上齿之外，及鼻下人中，乃神所居，混合百神之事。 盖任督二脉，为一身阴阳之海，五炁真元之会。 仙经云：一物含五采，永作仙人梯。 西元龟山九灵真仙母青金丹皇君道经第三十九 西元九灵炁，金丹流云宫。 上极游曜杪，晖景大霞空。 动回九天轮，静沉八流纲。 室有胎仙母，携衿太帝皇。 玄一灵时生，三老素牢张。 左把五符籍，右携理神宗。 同登龙朱阙，稽首玉清房。 拔弃死灭根，养形三五中。 七祖解尸结，受福明朱方。 上澄圣中尊，符化玄炁王。 极炁寿，受乘明。
chunks.translated_text:
The five viscera—only the heart and lungs reside above the diaphragm. The Central Yellow Thearch is named Han Guanglu, styled Hunming, ever guarding the center of the spleen and stomach. The *Huangting Jing* states: "The spleen spans one foot, covering the Great Granary." The *Zhonghuang Jing* also says: "The stomach is the Great Granary." The mouth of the Great Granary, within the stomach’s cavity, is precisely the gate where the clear and turbid are separated and transmitted.

*Xuanzhou Twenty-Nine Perfected Lords, Thearchs, and Controllers of Prohibitions, Scripture of the Dao, Chapter Thirty-Seven*

Xuanzhou severs the Three Fordless,
Feathered Splendor in the Great Void’s court.
Twisting skies fly o’er layered deserts,
Transforming and blending the myriad essences.
Five clouds billow in the boundless sky,
Seven auroras descend upon Round Brilliance.
Bright and clear, the Secluded and Vast One,
Brahma Prosperity aids Yellow Tranquility.
The Five Elders soar with crimson blossoms,
Scattering incense and bearing Jade Spirits.
Golden essence bathes in the Thearch’s River,
Green mists drift o’er flowing jade.
The divine severs the Three Paths’ accumulations,
Immortal embryos form in nascent shapes.
The Supreme Clarity Jade Thearch’s Master,
The Jade Palace Great Dao Lord,
With the heart’s Crimson Palace spirit,
Soars to the Venerable of Great Mystery.
Unfurl the divine radiance,
Inaugurate the Great Kalpa.

Beneath the isles of Xuanzhou lies the Ford of Three Weaknesses—this is the Weak Water. Feathered Splendor is the name of a hall. Layered Desert, a mountain. Round Brilliance, the name of the sun. The Secluded and Vast One is the style of the Grand One Lord. Brahma Prosperity is the name of the Grand One’s essence-spirit. Yellow Tranquility is the name of the Three Perfected of Essence-Blood. Jade Spirit is the Jade Youth of Supreme Clarity. Thearch’s River, a pool. Jade Palace, Supreme Clarity itself.

*The Three Divine Jade Talismans of the Great Cavern*
Recite the talisman’s subtle invocation:
The Upper Prime Minister of Mud-Pill Palace,
Named Zhao Lejing, styled Zhong Xuansheng,
Also called Qi Feibo, also Chang Fu Zhao.
The Middle Prime Minister of Crimson Palace,
Named Zhong Guangjian, styled Si Hualing,
Also called You Chebo, also Dong Shihua.
The Lower Prime Minister of Yellow Court,
Named Gui Shangming, styled Gu Xiaxuan,
Also called Feng Shenbo, also Cheng Guangsheng.
Ever guard my Three Prime Palaces,
Protect my original destiny,
Safeguard my Thearch’s chamber.

*The Scripture of the Great Void’s Dawn Lord, Engraved in the Jade Gate Cavern Palace of Mount Emei, Chapter Thirty-Eight*

The Three Perfected birth the Great Void,
Jade Gate □ dawn’s auroras.
The Great Simplicity’s Cavern Spirit,
Cinnabar Forest bears vermilion branches.
Returning spirit to the Ninefold Palace,
Inner Prosperity blooms jade blossoms.
A hundred passages receive essence-fluid,
Prolonging years in Three Elegance’s vale.
The nascent body ascends Jade Clarity,
Seven ancestors escape the dark paths.
Ever preserve beyond the final kalpa,
For myriad ages inheriting the immortal lineage.
Enthroned as the Sage Lineage’s Venerable,
The Great Cavern’s capital of Jade Clarity.
Lingchang Jade, the Lord of a Hundred Paths.

The Great Simplicity’s Cavern Spirit refers to the Great Simplicity Heaven’s Cavern-Radiant Palace of Primordial Spirit. Inner Prosperity is the name of a terrace. Three Elegance, a mountain. Great Cavern Capital, the divine capital.

*The Great Cavern Thearch-One Jade Talisman*
Recite the talisman’s subtle invocation:
The Venerable Lord of the Great Cavern Thearch-One,
Named Fu Ningzai, styled He Mujing,
Revolving winds blend and merge,
Guarding the tight passes of death’s qi,
Commanding the thirty-nine gate spirits of the body.
Ever present within the human—
Within the upper lip, the inner side of the upper teeth,
And below the nose in the philtrum, where the spirit dwells,
The convergence of all spirits’ affairs.
For the Conception and Governor Vessels are the seas of the body’s yin and yang,
The meeting of the five qi’s true origin.
The immortal scriptures say:
"A single thing embraces five hues,
Forever the immortal’s ladder."

*The Scripture of the Western Prime’s Nine-Spirit True Immortal Mother, Azure Gold Elixir Sovereign Lord, Chapter Thirty-Nine*

Western Prime’s ninefold spirit,
Golden Elixir flows in Cloud Palace.
Ascending to the utmost apex of radiance,
Splendor and light fill the great auroral sky.
In motion, revolving the Nine Heavens’ wheels,
In stillness, sinking the Eight Streams’ net.
Within the chamber, the Embryo Immortal Mother,
Bearing the lapels of the Grand Thearch.
Mysterious Unity’s spirit arises in time,
The Three Elders spread the plain and firm.
Left hand grasps the Five Talisman Registers,
Right hand carries the governance of the divine lineage.
Together ascending the Vermilion Dragon Gate,
Bowing heads in the Jade Clarity Chamber.
Uprooting the roots of death and decay,
Nurturing form within the Three and Five.
Seven ancestors untie the corpse’s knots,
Receiving blessings in the Bright Vermilion Realm.
Supreme Clarity’s Sacred Central Venerable,
Talisman-transforming Mysterious Qi King.
Utmost qi’s longevity,
Receiving the luminous chariot.

chunks.original_text: 西元者，桐柏山，或云昆仑山。 九灵，山中馆名也。 九天轮，乃天阙也。 八流钢，流纲之八山，即地轴也。 仙母乃坤母，为黄婆，为无夜夫人，为大药王，即太阴炼形之道。 灵时者，中央玄一老子之字也。 牢张上，三素老君名也。 神宗，中央司命丈人名也。 死灭根，言拔弃三十九死户也。 三五中，河图纵横，三五之数也。 大洞总真玉符 右符总三十九符真炁，於帝一之所。 同三十九符并以丹书，服皆用黄纸，佩通青素一幅，五尺五寸。 此符单用，亦可功备大成。 太玄真人咒曰 真人姓赵，讳守真，主太玄清明宫。 天中之天，仙峰岳京，楼台殿阁，宫室阙廷，洞房庭馆，福堂金城， 灵轩帝席，上首之名，关窍开通，门户窗棂，日月星跃，光□目睛， 风云烟霞，气息混凝，川池海波，血液津精，五脏六府，面部身形， 胞胎结节，各有神灵，求之不见，呼之斯应，神有万万，主一清宁， 一源万派，浊浊澄澄，万流一源，四海合并，大哉空洞，六合黄庭， 真一不二，法门无扃，三十死户，死炁常冰，我呼我神，常令惺惺， 如睡斯觉，如醉斯醒，虚灵谷神，混合五行，九十七相，放大光明， 死户之炁，自然更生，祖炁回润，孙枝敷荣，冢讼罢对，冤债无征， 普度天人，妙行圆成，大洞之富，万宝充盈，大洞之贵，仙位高登， 车回毕道，太微上清。 大洞内炼玉章 青童大道君，东蹑扶桑云。 心传大洞旨，灵章粲符文。 琅琅琼玉音，清响彻帝阍。 哀悯人间世，灭魔绝妖氛。 惠我清净光，弘济照无垠。 有如苍胡颉，运度玄中人。 五府生华采，九元常镇身。 虎服摄众邪，龙旗召百神。 离罗吐白炁，开朗高上晨。 太一雌雄混，七真阴阳分。 暂诣六渊宫，再回九光轮。 永寿无终劫，太初长为邻。 元君号紫虚，乘鸾谒玄都。 手持大洞经，锵然鸣琼琚。 分章三十九，嘘炁写灵符。 召摄生身神，静密守所居。 九真肃严卫，三元护储胥。 左携千景精，右抱起常扶。 并襟乐黄室，镜心留云珠。 游玩真阳馆，夙驾羽明车。 青峰插霄汉，玄景薄天衢。 洞微根至理，豁落起太无。 岂期咄嗟顷，奋迅风雷俱。 长保为仙伯，万神伺招呼。 三茅句曲山，兄弟列仙班。 振接魏元君，金简玉斑斓。 济济朱霞被，峨峨玉晨冠。 紫房锦帷幄，形庭青琅玕。 同心诣兰阙，接武登天坛。 逍遥蹑云汉，啸傲鸣佩环。 三晨散灵彩，四海澄波澜。 迅辔御神虎，拂衣乘青鸾。 位登圣统尊，消弥累劫艰。 呼吸九灵炁，炼造七还丹。 养形混帝室，回风启天关。 道通自然质，灵威来人间。 玉清大洞内炼玉经 玉清帝君玉章上品 碧梅青童君，驾龙朝紫宸。 九曜耀八极，五斗临生门。 二十八宿君，灿烂明天阍。 五帝来玉軿，三官降玄恩。 祥光洞天地，瑞气回阳春。 天司定仙籍，丁甲除妖氛。 金朦启玉章，日月停朱轮。 万神含我室，寿与天地存。 玉清内炼玉章中品 无上大罗天。 三景合四明。 紫户生梵炁，金光焕九清。 混合万神备，大圣期玉京。 洞章歌玉音，中黄敷宝经。 五帝宣玉符，三官启百灵。 劫劫应太平，返本如孩婴。 真风日荡荡，道炁常泠泠。 玉女散璚葩，金童闲玉扃。 无为赤元君，与道伺升沈。 玉清内炼玉章下品 嵯峨九光山，璚阙居上仙。 日月运金炁，龙虎奔玄关。

The Western Origin refers to Mount Tongbo or, as some say, Mount Kunlun. The Nine Spirits is the name of a hall within the mountain. The Nine Heavens’ Wheels are the celestial gates. The Eight Streams’ Net refers to the eight mountains of the earthly axis. The Immortal Mother is the Mother of Earth, known as the Yellow Matriarch, the Lady of No Night, the Great Medicine King—she embodies the Dao of refining form within the Great Yin.

The Spirit of the Time is the name of the Central Mysterious Unity Elder. The Three Elders are the Three Pristine Lords. The Divine Lineage refers to the Central Controller of Destiny, the Venerable One. The roots of death and decay signify the uprooting of the thirty-nine death gates. The Three and Five denote the vertical and horizontal numbers of the River Chart.

The *Great Cavern’s Jade Talisman of Total Perfection*
This talisman encompasses the thirty-nine talismanic true qi at the abode of the Supreme Unity. Alongside the thirty-nine talismans, all are inscribed in cinnabar, written on yellow paper, and worn with a plain blue silk sash measuring five feet and five inches. Even when used alone, this talisman may achieve great perfection.

The Incantation of the Supreme Mystery Perfected One
The Perfected One, surnamed Zhao and named Shouzhen, presides over the Palace of Supreme Mystery and Clarity.
Heaven within heaven, the celestial peak and sacred summit,
Pavilions and terraces, palaces and halls, chambers and courts,
Cavernous abodes and jade chambers, halls of fortune and golden cities,
Spiritual chariots and imperial seats, the names of the highest ranks—
All passages and orifices open and flow,
Doors and windows, lattice and frames,
Sun, moon, and stars leap forth, light fills the eyes,
Wind, clouds, mist, and auroras, qi congeals in harmony,
Rivers, pools, and ocean waves, blood and fluids, essence and spirit,
The five viscera and six bowels, the face and form of the body,
The womb’s knots and nodes—each harbors its own spirit.
Seek them and they are unseen, call them and they respond at once.
Though spirits number in the millions, they serve the One of Pure Tranquility.
One source, myriad streams—though turbid or clear,
All rivers return to a single source, the four seas merge as one.
Vast is the Cavern of Emptiness, the Six Harmonies’ Yellow Court,
The True One is undivided, the Dharma gate has no lock.
The thirty death gates, their deathly qi ever frozen—
I call to my spirits, ever keeping them wakeful,
As if from sleep they awaken, as if from drunkenness they sober.
Empty and numinous, the Valley Spirit unites the Five Phases,
Ninety-seven forms radiate great light.
The qi of the death gates naturally regenerates,
Ancestral qi returns to moisten, descendant branches flourish.
Litigation ceases, grievances dissolve without trace,
All beings are universally delivered, wondrous practice reaches completion.
The wealth of the Great Cavern overflows with myriad treasures,
Its nobility ascends to the highest immortal ranks.
The chariot returns to complete the Dao,
Ascending to the Supreme Mystery and Upper Clarity.

The *Jade Stanzas of the Great Cavern’s Inner Jade Chapters*
The Great Dao Lord of the Azure Youth,
Treading the clouds of Fusang in the east,
Transmits the Great Cavern’s decree,
Luminous stanzas and resplendent talismanic script.
Resonant jade tones, pure echoes reach the imperial gates.
Moved by compassion for the world of mortals,
He vanquishes demons and dispels malevolent vapors.
Bestowing upon me the light of purity,
Its vast salvation illumines without bound,
Like the ancient Cang Jie, he ferries those within the Mystery.
The Five Palaces bloom with radiant hues,
The Nine Origins ever guard the body.
Tiger robes subdue all evil,
Dragon banners summon the hundred spirits.
The Net of Separation exhales white qi,
Revealing the dawn of the highest realms.
The Supreme Unity blends yin and yang,
The Seven Perfected divide them.
Briefly visiting the Six Abyssal Palaces,
Then returning to the Ninefold Wheel of Light,
Eternally enduring beyond all kalpas,
Forever neighbor to the Great Beginning.

The Purple Void Lady, named Yuanjun,
Rides a simurgh to pay homage at the Mysterious Capital.
In hand she holds the *Great Cavern Scripture*,
Its jade pendants chiming with a crystalline ring.
Dividing the stanzas into thirty-nine,
She exhales qi to inscribe the numinous talismans.
Summoning and gathering the spirits of the living body,
She guards their abodes in stillness and secrecy.
The Nine Perfected stand in solemn vigil,
The Three Origins protect the storehouses.
To her left, she carries the Thousand Radiance Essence,
To her right, she embraces the Ever-Upholding One.
Together they enter the Yellow Chamber in joy,
Their mirrored hearts retaining the cloud-like pearl.
Roaming the True Yang Lodge,
Her ancient chariot drawn by feathered luminaries,
Green peaks pierce the empyrean,
Dark radiance grazes the celestial thoroughfare.
The profound root of the Cavern’s subtlety,
The vast and boundless arising from the Great Nonbeing—
Who could have foreseen that in a mere instant,
She would surge forth with the fury of wind and thunder?
Forever preserved as an immortal elder,
Myriad spirits attend her call.

On the Three Mao Brothers of Mount Juqu,
Ranked among the immortals’ assembly,
They welcome the Lady Wei Yuanjun,
Her golden tablets inscribed with jade patterns.
Resplendent in crimson auroras,
Adorned with towering Jade Dawn crowns,
Within purple chambers and brocade canopies,
Their courtyards lined with azure jade.
With one heart they approach the Orchid Gate,
Step by step ascending the Heavenly Altar.
Carefree, they tread the Milky Way,
Whistling and roaming, their pendants chiming.
The Three Dawns scatter spiritual radiance,
The Four Seas calm their waves.
Swiftly they ride divine tigers,
Brushing their robes as they mount azure simurghs.
Ascending to the honored ranks of the sagely lineage,
Dissolving the hardships of accumulated kalpas.
Inhaling the qi of the Nine Spirits,
Refining the Sevenfold Return Elixir.
Nurturing form within the imperial chamber,
Revolving the wind to open the celestial gates.
The Dao flows through natural essence,
Numinous power descends to the mortal realm.

The *Jade Stanzas of the Great Cavern’s Inner Jade Chapters of the Jade Clarity*
*Upper Grade of the Jade Stanza of the Jade Clarity Lord*
The Azure Plum Lord of the Azure Youth,
Driving dragons to court the Purple Palace.
The Nine Luminaries illuminate the Eight Poles,
The Five Celestial Granaries descend to the Gate of Life.
The Twenty-Eight Constellation Lords,
Resplendent, brighten the celestial gates.
The Five Emperors arrive in jade chariots,
The Three Officials bestow profound grace.
Auspicious light pervades heaven and earth,
Propitious qi revives the spring of yang.
Heavenly officers fix the immortal registers,
The Ding and Jia spirits dispel demonic vapors.
Golden veils unveil the jade stanzas,
Sun and moon halt their crimson wheels.
Myriad spirits fill my chamber,
My longevity endures with heaven and earth.

*Middle Grade of the Inner Jade Stanza of Jade Clarity*
The Supreme Great Luo Heaven,
Three Radiances merge with the Four Illuminations.
Purple portals birth Brahma qi,
Golden light blazes through the Nine Clarities.
All spirits unite in harmony,
The Great Sage awaits the Jade Capital.
Cavern stanzas chant jade tones,
The Central Yellow unfolds the precious scripture.
The Five Emperors proclaim jade talismans,
The Three Officials summon the hundred spirits.
Kalpa after kalpa, they respond to great peace,
Returning to the root like an infant.
The true wind ever billows,
The Dao’s qi perpetually pure.
Jade maidens scatter gem-like blossoms,
Golden lads leisurely tend the jade gates.
The Non-Action Red Origin Lord,
Accompanies the Dao in its rising and sinking.

*Lower Grade of the Inner Jade Stanza of Jade Clarity*
Towering, the Ninefold Mountain of Light,
Its jade towers housing the highest immortals.
Sun and moon circulate golden qi,
Dragon and tiger rush through the Mysterious Pass.

chunks.original_text: 灌溉碧芝房，灵苗生翠烟。 焕赫紫霞光，万圣垂云軿。 洞歌声朗朗，上彻天上天。 若能保其室，万劫为天仙。 内宝不外求，是为无上玄。 炼成大宝器，消摇归帝轩。 都匠符 服符咒曰 日出洋洋，真武游行，行符敕水，坐视四方，求道得道，求仙得仙， 长生久视，位纳真祥，万邪一见，情惨惊忙，急急如律令。 服用参扬。 沐浴，亦用此符。 一名大洞玉清都录真符，乃老君玉篆符廉中第一符，三中灵文，此符端首。 太玄真人咒曰 三十九户，固有神灵，未闻玉经，莫知其名，三十九符，随炁运行， 不见玉经，其文未明，我有道缘，心运玉经，经以致敬，经以致诚， 符求同炁，神应同声，灵谷洞虚，万籁自鸣，青天不云，真文自成， 感应之理，会神聚精，胞结自解，尸血自澄，阳回祖根，玄华长青， 父宁母精，徊风棍凝，宝珠放光，返胎结婴，气转洪钧，火候调停， 守雌抱雄，收视返听，颐养婴童，富贵黄庭，升降自然，回镜玉清， 胎辕既返，玉席高登，万遍道备，龙鹤来迎，功成名遂，玄俗光荣。 大洞玉经卷下竟

Irrigating the chambers of azure mushrooms,
Divine sprouts rise in emerald mist.
Resplendent, the purple auroras glow,
Myriad sages descend in cloud-borne chariots.
Cavern hymns ring clear and bright,
Piercing through heaven upon heaven.
Should one preserve this chamber,
For ten thousand kalpas they become a celestial immortal.
The inner treasure is not sought without—
This is the supreme mystery.
Refining the great vessel of treasure,
One dissolves and drifts back to the imperial chariot.

**Talisman of the Capital Artisan**
*Incantation for Ingesting the Talisman:*
The sun rises, vast and radiant,
True Martial roams and traverses.
Marching with talisman, commanding water,
Seated, surveying the four directions.
Seek the Dao and attain the Dao,
Seek immortality and attain immortality.
Long life and enduring vision,
Rank receives true auspices.
At the sight of myriad evils,
Their hearts tremble in dread.
Hasten, hasten, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

*Usage:* Ingest with reverent invocation. For ablutions, this talisman is also used.

Also named *The Great Cavern Jade Clarity Register of the True Talisman of the Capital*, this is the first talisman in the Jade Script Talisman Treasury of the Lord Lao, the foremost of the three numinous writings.

*The Perfected of the Great Mystery’s Incantation:*
Thirty-nine portals,
Firmly guarded by spirits.
Before hearing the Jade Scripture,
None knew their names.
Thirty-nine talismans,
Circulate with the qi’s movement.
Without seeing the Jade Scripture,
Their patterns remain obscure.
I possess the affinity of the Dao,
My heart revolves the Jade Scripture.
The scripture commands reverence,
The scripture commands sincerity.
Talismans seek unity with qi,
Spirits respond in unison.
The numinous valley, cavernous and void,
Myriad sounds resonate of themselves.
The azure sky bears no clouds,
Yet the true script emerges on its own.
The principle of resonance,
Gathers spirit and concentrates essence.
The fetal knot unravels of itself,
The corpse’s blood clarifies on its own.
Yang returns to the ancestral root,
The mysterious blossom flourishes evergreen.
Father’s serenity, mother’s essence,
Revolving wind, congealing staff.
The precious pearl radiates light,
Returning to the womb, the infant coalesces.
Qi revolves the vast potter’s wheel,
Fire and timing harmonized.
Embrace the feminine, hold the masculine,
Withdraw vision, return hearing.
Nurture the infant child,
Wealth and honor fill the Yellow Court.
Ascent and descent occur naturally,
The mirror turns toward Jade Clarity.
Once the fetal carriage returns,
The jade mat ascends on high.
After ten thousand recitations, the Dao is complete,
Dragon and crane come to welcome.
Merit accomplished, fame achieved,
The mystery and the common alike shine in glory.

*Here ends the Lower Scroll of the Great Cavern Jade Scripture.*
